citation.article-title: Genomic analysis of Borrelia japonica sp. nov. isolated from Ixodes ovatus in Japan.

p.s: Description of Borrelia japonica sp. nov.
Borrelia japonica (ja. po' ni. ca. N.L. adj. japonica, pertaining to Japan , the country in which the organisms were isolated)
Morphology as described previously for the genus (21).
Cultural properties as described previously for B. burgdorferi sensu lato (6).

Strains of this species react with H5332 mono clonalantibody directed against OspA protein (20,21 , 23). rRNA gene restriction patterns after digestion by Hind III contain one fragment (2.1-kb).The G+C content of the DNA is 27.9-28.3 mol% (28.1 mol% in type strain).
Type strain: Strain H014 (=JCM 8951) isolated from an Ixodes ovatus tick in Japan (20)
